Keywords: Avengers , Brute , Cosmic , Dark Avengers , Monster
Real Name: Robert Reynolds
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Destroy Blocking
TARGETING: Destroy Blocking
HURL INTO ORBIT: When Sentry hits an opposing character with a close attack with a roll of 10 or greater that wasn't rerolled by friendly characters, after resolutions place the hit character in any square.
LOSE CONTROL: Charge, Flurry.
THE ANGEL OF DEATH: Penetrating/Psychic Blast. Steal Energy, but for close and range attacks.

Comments
December 11, 2022
tidge
The dial is well-designed for the (literally, figuratively) crazy character that is Sentry... the point-cost is another matter; I think it is under-costed, even for 2022. Move+attack plus Steal Energy (close OR range!) on top of the defense track AND Cosmic Energy, plus a point cost that means this could be the backup OR the tent-pole... yeesh! That this is a prime is I suppose the only saving grace. The dial seems (to me, anyway) to much much better costed when considered as a +5 point investment addition to the standard Av4e versions. I don't know that (as a prime) this would ever be a piece added to "popular meta" teams, but with those keywords (Avengers, Brute, Cosmic) and at only 100 points this could be a highly frustrating figure to play against at the local level.
November 20, 2022
RockyRaccoon
Giving him skybreaker seems busted. Pair him with Genesis Prize and you’re basically one hit KO’ing everything

brainiacFTW
[QUOTE=Emtemss;12219903]You know, I look at a figure like this, at this cost, and I know for certain the entire Clix world has shifted in the biggest fashion we've ever seen. This piece would've been 150 points a couple years ago, and 200 points a couple years before that. Phenomenal figure, and a great representation.[/QUOTE] I remember when the Kingdom Come chases came out with numbers like this and dials about this length for something like 150-200 each and the general community reaction was "holy CRAP these are pushed". ....good times. :/
